item.title: Food safety scandal: Fuel tanker trucks used to transport cooking oil in China, suggests report
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Donald Trump challenges 'crooked' Biden for golf battle with $1 million charity bet
item.description: Former President Donald Trump challenged President Biden to a golf match at his Doral course, offering to donate $1 million to a charity if he loses. Trump's offer, made during a rally, includes a 20-stroke advantage for Biden. Biden's spokesperson criticized Trump’s recent actions and emphasized Biden's focus on leadership, dismissing the challenge as a distraction.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Chinese father makes daughter collect tears in bowl for watching too much TV
item.description: A father in Yulin, southern China, punished his 3-year-old daughter, Jiajia, for watching too much TV by making her try to fill a bowl with her tears, captured in a viral video. The incident sparked mixed reactions online, highlighting the spectrum of strict to indulgent parenting in China.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'It's a historic day ...': Europe celebrates successful Ariane 6 launch after four-year delay
item.description: Europe's Ariane 6 rocket successfully completed its maiden flight, launching satellites from Kourou, French Guiana, and restoring Europe's autonomous space access. Despite minor issues and a trajectory deviation, the launch marked a significant achievement after a four-year development delay. This success comes amid rising competition in the space industry and Europe's recent lack of independent satellite launch capabilities.
item.dc:creator: TOI Science Desk

item.title: Israeli strike on Gaza school kills 29; likely to damper truce talks
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'Nightmare world': Jupiter-sized planet, which is 64 light-years from Earth, reeks of rotten eggs
item.description: HD 189733 b, a hot Jupiter 64 light-years away, has an atmosphere with hydrogen sulfide, giving it a rotten egg smell. The planet, orbiting its star in 2.2 days, has extreme conditions: 1,700°F temperatures, glass rain, and 5,400 mph winds. This discovery aids understanding of sulfur's role in gas giant formation.
item.dc:creator: TOI Science Desk

item.title: In the Aging Senate, Nobody wants to be the one to nudge Biden aside
item.description: Senate Democrats are grappling with the issue of President Biden's candidacy as concerns grow about his ability to perform. While some members urge him to consider stepping aside, Biden remains firm in his commitment to stay in the race. The situation mirrors past challenges with aging colleagues in Congress.

item.title: 54-year-old woman, who received pig kidney transplant plus a heart pump, dies
item.description: Lisa Pisano, 54, from New Jersey, passed away after living 47 days with a genetically modified pig kidney transplant. She was critically ill with kidney and heart failure. The transplant failed due to inadequate blood flow from a mechanical heart pump. Despite the setback, her case advanced xenotransplantation, offering hope to those in need of alternative organ supplies.

item.title: ‘Trump will win by a landslide’: Michael Bennet becomes first Democrat Senator to break ties with Biden
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'Putin can't divide, outlast or weaken us': White House at 75th Nato anniversary
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Melania Trump's rare appearance at Manhattan fundraiser in a $4,000 dress
item.description: ​Former first lady Melania Trump hosted a political fundraiser in New York Monday night, Daily Mail reported with details that the red Valentino dress that she wore cost $4,000. Melania hosted an intimate group at Trump Tower to raise money for the Log Cabin Republicans, the largest conservation LGBTQ+ organization.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'How the hell...': Pastor smacks wife on flight. This is the reason
item.description: A pastor smacked her wife on an Alaska Airlines flight flying from Seattle to Anchorage after she got upgraded to first class but he didn't. The incident took place on July 2 on flight 275 as passengers witnessed the horrific exchange between the couple. The Independent reported that a criminal complained was filed against the pastor.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Why Nato summit is important for Joe Biden in presidential race
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Boeing horror: Mechanic sucked into engine in Iran's Chabahar
item.description: ​A mechanic was sucked into the engines of a Boeing plane at Iran's Chabahar Konarak airport in a horrific incident that took place earlier this month. According to reports, Abolfazl Amiri was dragged into the engine of the Varesh Airline's Boeing 737-500 when he went near the aircraft to get a tool. The engine was on for a test run.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'The Almighty calls for Biden: They want you gone, sir'
item.description: The Democratic-media establishment, often considered a powerful force in American politics, is urging President Joe Biden to withdraw from the presidential race, following his disappointing debate performance and subsequent media scrutiny, according to an editorial in the Wall Street Journal. The WSJ reports that the media, which had previously supported Biden, has turned against him, citing instances of cognitive decline.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk
